profileAlternative.name: Lucas Zalduendo
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at The Trade Desk
profileAlternative.summary: I like telling stories with data. I take a rigorous and quantitative approach to understanding data which usually involves creating statistical models. These models allow us to ask unique questions and simulate custom “What if...?” scenarios. Throughout my process, I always keep an eye towards communicating results visually to empower a broad audience both technically inclined and otherwise.
